summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard E. and Montlake Boulevard N.E. and included intersections between E. Hamlin St. and N.E. 47th St.; authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington for financial assistance; and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial Development Fund therefor.
